pr_title: DHFPROD-6378: Add matching/merging steps to project download

timeline.bodyText: This can just be the steps collection, since we're now supporting all of them.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Changed to use the STEP_COLLECTION constant.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6378: Add matching/merging/custom steps to project download

timeline.bodyText:
@ryanjdew , @rjrudin
I think we originally didn't include the steps that can't be created/modified in HC. Since custom steps can't be created/modified in HC, should that be included as well ?
timeline.author: srinathgit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,8 +30,7 @@ const userArtifactQuery = cts.andQuery([
     // cannot be managed via HC
     consts.FLOW_COLLECTION,
     consts.ENTITY_MODEL_COLLECTION,
-    "http://marklogic.com/data-hub/steps/ingestion",
-    "http://marklogic.com/data-hub/steps/mapping"
+    consts.STEP_COLLECTION

replies.bodyText: @srinathgit  That's correct, that's my mistake. @ryanjdew sorry about that, you had it correct before with each of the non-custom-step collections listed out.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I've adjusted it to exclude custom steps.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6378: Add matching/merging steps to project download
